page.title: 05Northfleet Sports Centre
page.content: The centre is a big building but looks dull and ugly.It has parking space for about 50 cars and is open from 10am to 10pm.The facilities consist of Sports Hall,Upper Hall,Social Area,Coffee Bar Meeting Room,Outside Pitches.The Sport Centre is run by Kent County Council. Attached to the centre is a swimming pool run by the Borough Council.There is a wide range of equipment and the main hall is the size of 4 badminton courts.There are leisure activities such as roller skating,dance and darts The sports you can do are football,net ball,volleyball,short tennis,badminton judo,weight lifting and others.There is a club for children 6-13 which is called Twilight.There are also other clubs such as UB40 for the unemployed of 16 years and over who have nowhere to go and Lunch-Time-Drop-In for those who cannot afford to pay for a meal.
